name: Face Randomiser
description:
CONTROLS: 

Tap/click on the button in the top left as often as you want.

This game is part of my prosopagnosia (face blindness) collection where I am exploring faces, what makes them, how their memories are stored etc. This is a mini game that explores how noticable subtle differences are. 

There are over 250 combinations of features and some of them also have size and rotation randomisers on them.  Yet without looking closely, the faces all look very similar to one another. We recognise them as faces, but we don't seem to recognise the faces. 

Interesting!
